articles.description: Follow live radio commentary of Katie Boulter in Australian Open second round - radio and live text later on Katie Boulter, Jannik Sinner and Daniil Medvedev.
articles.title: Australian Open LIVE: Katie Boulter v Veronika Kudermetova after Emma Raducanu wins

articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction to Wednesday's Premier League matches as Arsenal beat Tottenham in the north London derby.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Arsenal beat Spurs as Newcastle, Villa & Palace also win

articles.description: The Los Angeles Clippers thrash the Brooklyn Nets 126-67 to set a new record for their largest margin of victory.
articles.title: NBA: Los Angeles Clippers set record in win over Brooklyn Nets

articles.description: In a new BBC documentary, key figures associated with Real Madrid discuss why the club is so successful in the Champions League.
articles.title: How to win the Champions League: Real Madrid

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she apologised to fellow Briton Andy Murray over her Wimbledon mixed doubles withdrawal last year as she did not want any "bad blood" between the pair.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu apologised to Andy Murray to avoid 'bad blood'

articles.description: Arsenal's vital win over Tottenham must be the catalyst for both their Premier League title challenge and a striker search, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal 2-1 Tottenham: Why derby win must be title catalyst for Arteta and co

articles.description: With Alexander Isak in "red-hot form" and Newcastle on a club record-equalling winning run, what can they achieve this season?
articles.title: 'Alexander Isak is in red-hot form' - but are Newcastle United in Premier League title race?

articles.description: Emma Raducanu earns a dogged win over Amanda Anisimova to reach the Australian Open third round - where she faces Iga Swiatek -  for the first time.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Emma Raducanu beats Amanda Anisimova and faces Iga Swiatek in Melbourne next

articles.description: Barcelona back up their Spanish Super Cup triumph by thrashing Real Betis to cruise into the quarter-finals of the Copa del Rey.
articles.title: Barcelona 5-1 Real Betis: Lamine Yamal stars as Barca reach Copa del Rey quarter-finals

articles.description: Lyon are knocked out in the last 32 of the Coupe de France on penalties by an amateur team from the fifth tier of French football.
articles.title: Bourgoin-Jallieu 2-2 Olympique Lyonnais (4-2 on pens): Lyon beaten by fifth-tier amateurs in Coupe de France
